title: Noun collection 2
sentences: Where is the spoon for the soup?
I like to read on the sofa in the living room.
No puedo ver bien sin mis
I can't see well without my glasses.
I'm going to the pharmacy to buy medicine.
Este verano queremos ir a la
This summer we want to go to the beach in Valencia.
Can you lend me your comb for a moment?
Be careful when going down the stairs.
está muy caliente, no la toques.
The frying pan is very hot, don't touch it.
Turn off the television before sleeping.
I put the computer on the desk.
The children play in the park in the afternoon.
From here you can see the mountain with snow.
I need a clean towel for the shower.
The bed is very comfortable and big.
The chicken is in the oven cooking.
del pasillo es de color rojo.
I'm looking for a bank to take out money.
Wash your hands with soap before eating.
pasa por el centro del pueblo.
The river passes through the center of the village.
We turn on the lamp because it's very dark.
I accidentally broke a plate in the kitchen.
I carry the keys inside the bag.
Do you want to go to the cinema tonight?
The pillow is too soft for me.
I use the toothbrush after every meal.
dictionary:
